name: STARLIMS
tag_list: laboratory-informatics, lims, laboratory-information-management-system, electronic-laboratory-notebook, scientific-document-management-system, laboratory-software
overview:
STARLIMS provides Laboratory Information Management Software (LIMS) to help laboratories optimize data management, accessibility, integrity and long-term value.

The STARLIMS platform incorporates an Electronic Laboratory Notebook, Scientific Document Management System and Laboratory Information Management System into one unified platform.

The unified platform is designed for laboratories operating in a variety of industries: clinical research, diagnostics, environmental, forensics, manufacturing, petrochemical, refining, pharmaceutical, biotech and public health.
